text: Lamballe-Armor is a commune in the Côtes-d'Armor department in Brittany in northwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Lamballe (the seat), Morieux and Planguenoual.Arrêté préfectoral 31 October 2018 ==References== Category:Communes of Côtes-d'Armor
title: Lamballe-Armor
